definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Through last winter, China’s central bank repeatedly raised the amount of capital it required Chinese commercial banks to deposit with it.
sentences.chinese: 去年整個冬天，中國央行不斷向商業銀行縮緊銀根。

sentences.english: But the problem isn’t just tight-fisted banks.
sentences.chinese: 但問題不僅僅只在於銀根緊鎖的銀行。

sentences.english: The tight-money policy was also reducing the pressure on prices.
sentences.chinese: 收縮銀根的政策也減少了價格壓力。

sentences.english: The tight money condition and high bank interest are taxing for us.
sentences.chinese: 銀根緊縮，銀行利息高，讓我們特別感到有壓力。

sentences.english: First, he tried in a typically conservative fashion to tighten the money supply.
sentences.chinese: 首先，他以一種典型的保守主義姿態試圖收縮銀根。

sentences.english: Money is tight just now in the bank.
sentences.chinese: 現在該銀行的銀根很緊。

sentences.english: When money is in short supply,many businesses fail.
sentences.chinese: 銀根喫緊時，許多企業會倒閉。
